00052 RainbruRPG::Gui::NetFlooderWindow::NetFlooderWindow(FXApp * a)
00053    :FXMainWindow(a,"RainbruRPG Xident",NULL,NULL,DECOR_ALL,0,0,800,600){
00054 
00055   // We start with an incremental panel identifier at 0
00056   switcherChildId=0;
00057 
00058   FXint opt= BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH;
00059 
00060   // frame containing admin info and button
00061   FXVerticalFrame *frame = new FXVerticalFrame(this, LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00062 
00063 
00064   // Menubar
00065   FXMenuBar * menubar = new FXMenuBar(frame,LAYOUT_SIDE_TOP|LAYOUT_FILL_X|FRAME_RAISED);
00066 
00067   filemenu = new FXMenuPane(this);
00068   new FXMenuCommand(filemenu,"&Quit\tCtl-Q\tQuit the application.",
00069                     NULL,getApp(),FXApp::ID_QUIT);
00070 
00071   toolmenu = new FXMenuPane(this);
00072   new FXMenuCommand(toolmenu,"&Servers\tCtl-S\t"
00073                     "Choose a server to be flooded.",
00074                     NULL,this,ID_TOOL_SERVER);
00075   new FXMenuCommand(toolmenu,"&Waiting\tCtl-A\t"
00076                     "Waiting connection to a server.",
00077                     NULL,this,ID_TOOL_WAITING);
00078 
00079   new FXMenuCommand(toolmenu,"&Flooding\tCtl-F\t"
00080                     "Flooding a selected server.",
00081                     NULL,this,ID_TOOL_FLOOD);
00082 
00083   helpmenu = new FXMenuPane(this);
00084   new FXMenuCommand(helpmenu,"About x&Ident\tCtl-I\t"
00085                     "Primary informations about xident.",NULL,this,
00086                     ID_HELP_ABOUT);
00087 
00088   new FXMenuTitle(menubar,"&File",NULL,filemenu);
00089   new FXMenuTitle(menubar,"&Manage",NULL,toolmenu);
00090   new FXMenuTitle(menubar,"&Help",NULL,helpmenu,  
00091                   FX::LAYOUT_RIGHT| FX::LAYOUT_TOP);
00092 
00093 
00094   // Matric containing Admin info
00095   FXHorizontalFrame* frMatrix=new FXHorizontalFrame(frame, LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00096 
00097   // Admin info
00098   FXLabel* labAdminName=new FXLabel(frMatrix, "Admin :");
00099   FXTextField* tfAdminName=new FXTextField (frMatrix, 20 );
00100   FXLabel* labAdminPwd=new FXLabel(frMatrix, "Password :");
00101   FXTextField* tfAdminPwd=new FXTextField (frMatrix, 20 );
00102 
00103   // The FXSwitcher
00104   FXuint fillAll=LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y;
00105 
00106   switcher=new FXSwitcher(frame,fillAll);
00107 
00108   ConnectionPanel* cp=new ConnectionPanel(switcher,fillAll, this, 
00109                                           ID_SHOW_WAITING_PANEL);
00110 
00111   panelConnectionId=switcherChildId++;
00112 
00113   wp=new WaitingPanel(switcher,fillAll, this->client);
00114   panelWaitingId=switcherChildId++;
00115 
00116   fp=new FloodPanel(switcher,fillAll, this->client);
00117   panelFloodId=switcherChildId++;
00118 
00119   // The status bar
00120   FXStatusBar* sb=new FXStatusBar (frame, LAYOUT_FILL_X|
00121                                    STATUSBAR_WITH_DRAGCORNER);
00122 
00123 
00124   wp->sigConnectionRefused.connect(sigc::mem_fun(this, 
00125      &RainbruRPG::Gui::NetFlooderWindow::slotConnectionRefused));
00126   wp->sigConnectionAccepted.connect(sigc::mem_fun(this, 
00127      &RainbruRPG::Gui::NetFlooderWindow::slotConnectionAccepted));
00128 
00129 
00130 }

00207 onManageServer(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){

00241 long RainbruRPG::Gui::NetFlooderWindow::
00242 onShowWaitingPanel(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00243   LOGI("onShowWaitingPanel called");
00244   switcher->setCurrent(panelWaitingId, false);
00245   wp->setServer((tServerListItem*)v);
00246   return 1;
00247 }

00252 void RainbruRPG::Gui::NetFlooderWindow::slotConnectionRefused(){
00253   LOGI("NetFlooderWindow::slotConnectionRefused");
00254   switcher->setCurrent(panelConnectionId, false);
00255   wp->reset();
00256 }

00273 }

00278 void RainbruRPG::Gui::NetFlooderWindow::slotConnectionAccepted(){
00279   LOGI("NetFlooderWindow::slotConnectionAccepted");
00280   switcher->setCurrent(panelFloodId, false);
00281   wp->reset();
00282 }
